menu_item.name: FOTO221
menu_item.img: THIS FILE USES <font color='#999999'>FLASH 8 BITMAP DATA</font> COMPONENTS. THIS MAKES IMAGES LOOK MUCH BETTER WHEN THEY ARE RESIZED.
<font color='#999999'>IMAGE, SWF AND FLV</font> FILES SUPPORTED. CONTENT WILL BE ADJUSTED ACCORDING TO FILE TYPE.
USE <font color='#999999'>ZOOM OPTIONS BELOW</font>. ENJOY FLASH POWER ON HIGH RESOLUTION IMAGES AND VIDEOS.
